Posts.Content: Sep 9, 2014 01:09PM Laurais50 wrote: Why is it okay to make fun of ourselfs, but when others do we get offended? I told my BF that I felt like Elmer Fudd lol...He said no you remind me of Uncle Fester... WTH???? I got really upset, he said he was joking, (not funny) At the time it was like eewww really that's who you think of when you see me? Well I am over it now, but I believe that if you think it, than say it out loud, then you mean it. Well what do I expect... We both agreed that casper was a little nicer. Ugggg and then to watch all those hair commercials, for thicker more manageable, hair try blah, blah, blah...Anyway, ladies enjoy you Tuesday. Any of you ladies Master Chef fans? If so who do you think is going to win? I think Leslie.

Posts.Content: Sep 4, 2014 11:08PM Laurais50 wrote: OMG... It's really hard to read how long it takes to get your hair back. I'm only 1 month out and started Arimidex 4 days ago. I am so tired of being bald, having no eyebrows or lashes. I'm not all that to begin with and now, I feeel like I look lile a freak. I know it's vain of me, but enough is enough. I feel ugly all the time, that I don't hardly ever go out. And now I'm worried that the Arimidex will delay my hair growth.  I have heard and read about Biotin, and Hair Surge and even coconut oil. Do they really work or is it just a crock of bs, And is giving false hope? I don't know. Sorry for being so negative, I'm just sick and tired of being sick and tired. You know what I mean? Thanks
